txt.en: 'All this talk of the Weeping Warrior, and now another of his kind has come to the North? It cannot be!'
'It seems to me the War just ended. Can we even defend Dale against another new foe?'
'We have not forgotten the hurts done to our people by Smaug. If a cold-drake now comes for us, what hope have we?'
'If it is not one foe, it is another! When shall there be peace?'
